question:
how do you turn off an alarm in the alarm app on iphone?

Choices:
A: click the switch next to the alarm until it is green.
B: click the switch next to the alarm until it is grey.
steps: When interacting with the alarm app on an iPhone, each alarm has a switch next to it indicating whether the alarm is active or inactive.
An active alarm will be shown with a switch that is green, indicating that the alarm will ring at the specified time.
To turn off the alarm, you need to change the switch from green (active) to grey (inactive).
Therefore, choosing to click the switch next to the alarm until it is grey will effectively turn off the alarm.
